entry.title: [GLOBAL][Web Cloud] - Incident on ovh.us domain
entry.content:
Jul 10, 10:28 UTC

End time : 10/07/2024 02:16 UTC
Root cause : We had a technical issue with our domain provider
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 10, 01:01 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : The issue has been fixed.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Jul 10, 00:33 UTC
Update - Our technical teams and our provider fixed the root cause that caused the incident.
It may take 1 hour for the impact to be totally cleared.

Jul 10, 00:09 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams identified the root cause of the incident and are currently working with our registrar to solve the issue.

Jul 9, 22:36 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/07/2024 22:00 UTC
